metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7506 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The gif_next_LZW function in libnsgif.c in Libnsgif 0.1.2 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a crafted LZW stream in a GIF file.

criterions.comment: libnsgif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
